Dec 13 is a special day for Chinese Canadians in Ontario for lots of reasons.

The day marks the 83rd anniv. of #NanjingMassacre; the 4th anniv. of Nanjing Massacre Commemorative Day in Ontario; and the 3rd anniv. of establishment of Nanjing Massacre Victims Monument in #Toronto.
